name: Marco_Zarik
content:
Marco Zarik was a male Human information broker living during the Cold War and Galactic War.
Marco Zarik appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Bounty Hunting Week event. He can appear on any of the following worlds: Ord Mantell, Coruscant, Nal Hutta, Dromund Kaas, Nar Shaddaa, Tatooine, Alderaan and Voss. The player has the option to ask him for information nicely, rudely or neutrally. In any case, he provides the location of a local crime lord's henchman. As such, his role in the game is almost entirely random or player-driven and a canonical path currently cannot be determined.
